title: CREATE VIEW
text: The CREATE VIEW command creates a view.
A view is a virtual table based on the result set of an SQL statement.
The following SQL creates a view that selects all customers from Brazil:

Example

CREATE VIEW [Brazil 
  Customers] AS
SELECT 
  CustomerName, ContactName
FROM Customers
WHERE 
  Country = "Brazil";

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
CREATE VIEW [Brazil 
  Customers] AS
SELECT 
  CustomerName, ContactName
FROM Customers
WHERE 
  Country = "Brazil";
